name: Mothman
description: The legendary harbinger of doom. Mothman appears before disasters, and its presence alone can turn the tide of battle through prophecy and calamity.

abilities.name: Prophecy of Doom
abilities.description: Marks an enemy; after 8 seconds, they take massive damage.

abilities.name: Disaster Sight
abilities.description: Reveals an area and marks all enemies for increased damage.

abilities.name: Calamity
abilities.description: When Mothman dies, triggers a disaster damaging all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Omen of Ruin
abilities.description: Calls down a catastrophic event at target location.
